room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Phoenix
review: The Cellar was ok but Vacation Vandals was ridiculous. More about being able to work devices than anything. Employee didn't know room well enough to give helpful clues.

room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Phoenix
review: We had my sons 7th bday party there last night and the staff was AMAZING!!! From the initial phone call in setting up the party to the actual event they were amazing! So friendly! Moved us to a bigger room toaccommodate extra kids we had and just made it a smooth party for such a large group! We will definitely be back to celebrate there!

room_title: Escape room "Vacation Vandals" by Key Quest in Phoenix
review: Super Awesome place to hang with the girls on a Girls night out...or family time with the Fam Bang!!!
